about_the_game:
New from Ayato Sound Create, Darkness Kingdom is a fantastic well rounded pack for covering any dark, ominous scene your story might need.

Blending retro percussion, choirs and orchestral instruments, reminiscent of 90s game music soundtracks, with music for many different scenarios including battles, boss battles, field jungles, field dungeons, event themes and more, this pack is a great addition to your RPG-themed games and beyond!

Music with orchestration for fantasy, dark themes, danger, horror and more!
30 BGM in .ogg, ogg with loop tag, .mp3, .m4a and .wav formats.

Tracklist:

1. field_nomal_unity
2. field_nomal_enemy

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution
